email.description: Email MCP Server - Draft and send emails via Gmail API with HITL approval

instructions.draft_email: Creates email draft in /Plans/email_draft_[date].md. Does not send.
instructions.send_email: Sends email via Gmail API. Requires credentials.json and HITL approval.
instructions.approval_workflow: 1. Draft email -> 2. Review in /Plans/ -> 3. Move to /Pending_Approval/ -> 4. Approve -> 5. Send
